actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to revise the allotment formula for grants for construction of treatment works.
subjects: Federal aid to water pollution control

summary.text: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to revise the formula for determining State allotments for fiscal years 1980 and 1981 for grants for construction of waste treatment works. Specifies the formula for determining such allotments.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to revise the allotment formula for grants for construction of treatment works.
